item.title: Python for Complete Beginners
item.author: 4rkal
item.description: Why you should use Python. Going over the basics of Python. In this course/article I will be talking about why someone should use Python. Later on, I will be tackling the basics of Python. But let’s start by explaining what coding is. What is coding? Coding means writing instructions for computers and a finished set of instructions is known as a program. Computer programs control everything from smartphones to space rockets.
